title: Help choosing skins in client
body:
Hi, I atm do have and like the Mecha Aatrox skin, and not because of looking like Gundam. It just kinda feels to make quite some sense with him.
Now my head is mind boggling a bit on what else to buy.
I am not sure if I should get Mecha Malphite because of Aatrox or not, or just to keep my Glacial Malp skin. They both feel cool.
If someone can give me some idea, thanks.
Also I want Infernal Nasus, Arclight Vayne, and some others like maybe the traditional ones too (I know I can't buy, Rip).
And maybe Pentakill Sona...

replies.body: Groovy Zilean is very good choice

> [{quoted}](name=ForwardSkies,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=ZAuQzhpI,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-06-11T00:49:00.410+0000)
>
> Groovy Zilean is very good choice

I think i have Groovy, blood moon and Shurima zilean lols
I played with a guy who used a mecha aatrox skin yesterday. He decided to start feeding because I ksed or something.
